title: Why Alphabet and Other Big Tech Stocks Rallied
text: Tech titans' stocks rallied a investors appeared optimistic with their prospects under the new administration of President Joe Biden.

title: 8 Internet Stocks to Consider Logging into Before They Go Higher
text: E-commerce and the cloud have given many investors a tidy retirement, but can internet stocks keep or expand those gains in the new normal? The post 8 Internet Stocks to Consider Logging into Before They Go Higher appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: What to Expect When Facebook Reports Q4 Earnings
text: The key numbers to consider when evaluating Facebook stock is growth in advertising, daily average users and monthly average users. The post What to Expect When Facebook Reports Q4 Earnings appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Facebook (FB) Faces Mounting Heat Over Media Market Monopoly
text: Facebook (FB) continues to face mounting criticism for misinformation handling and antitrust probes for violating competition law in Australia despite efforts to sustain brand value.

title: ESG Stocks to Gather Speed Under Biden's Leadership: 5 Picks
text: Biden's administration plans to address climate change and take ESG initiatives. This call for investing in Shopify (SHOP), Magna International (MGA), IDEXX Lab (IDXX), Facebook (FB) and PayPal (PYPL).

title: Facebook's Stock Falls 6% In A Week, Is It An Aberration?
text: Facebook's stock fell almost -6.1% in the last one week and currently trades at $251 per share. The fall was triggered by fear of reduced future subscribers due to some political groups leaving the site.
